commitMessage:

@@@SOLR-4952: get all manged schema tests using solrconfig.snippet.randomindexconfig.xml - mainly by removing several solrconfig-*-managed-schema.xml files and using sys props in solrconfig-managed-schema.xml

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/lucene/dev/trunk@1513611 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

@@@LUCENE-5512: remove redundant typing (diamond operator) in trunk

@@@LUCENE-5906: Use Files.delete everywhere instead of File.delete

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/lucene/dev/trunk@1622506 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

@@@ SOLR-10887: Append .xml to managed-schema file VERSION 2 (#279)

Managed schema file is now called "managed-schema.xml".  however there is a fallback to "managed-schema" since that is a common legacy name for the file.   Updated the name of the files used in running tests.
